column4: anybody know if there's a good way to determine all that files in /etc that I've changed from the installed defaults?  I want to back just these up.
a lesson learned..back up config files before modifying...anyhow you may as well re-install
I'm not having any problems.  I just want a list of all the files I've modified
look at your history, you may be able to garner which files you touched
